Class BlackjackCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • BlackjackCard

  • public class BlackjackCard
extends java.lang.Object
    BlackjackCard defines the behaviors and attributes of a blackjack card. A blackjack card has a value, a suit and a status of being in or out of a deck
